title: T'Pau - Bridge of Spies (1987) [FLAC]
description:
Bridge of Spies is the debut album by British pop group T'Pau, released in September 1987. For its US release, Virgin Records renamed Bridge of Spies to simply T'Pau. It spawned five hit singles â€“ "Heart and Soul", "China in Your Hand", "Valentine," "Sex Talk" and "I Will Be with You".
